ygData.subject: Re: War and Peace
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: You said Soundwave, Soulstice. Anyway, im leaving today to go up to Stratton, Vermont for the week, and i doubt i ll be able to post. As usual, im not

OOC: You said Soundwave, Soulstice. Anyway, im leaving today to go up to 
Stratton, Vermont for the week, and i doubt i'll be able to post. As usual, 
im not giving my chars to anyone, so please try to wait up.

:::Ratchet/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Godfather/Wheeljack:::

Ratchet: Yeah, Rhinox, im okay. I just cant move my legs, and therefore cant 
dodge. Now you shyould get out of here before you get caught in the crossfire.
::Ratchet all of a sudden gets an idea.  He transforms to beast mode and- 
yes! As long as he stays in beast mode he can move! The only downside is 
that... hes an elephant::
Ratchet: Uh-oh.
::He gets hit by Wildrider in the side, the place where he has the most 
armor. He now has big wound in his side. The shots from Squawktalk miss him::
Ratchet: You'll pay for that!
::He fires 15 shots from one gun at Wildrider and 15 shots from the other at 
Squawktalk::
~~~~~
::Sharpedge, Jetstorm, and Godfather hear Shockaract and follow him::
~~~~~
::Wheeljack installs the torpedos outside of the Iron Fist and takes out his 
test drones. He starts them up and watches to see what happens::

--part1_fe.284b7d7.27c29638_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
